sub_title:
Sales, Operations 
and Customer Manager - (Open for opportunities)
summary:
A dynamic and pro-active Senior Project and operations coordinator with 10+ years of experience in researching, planning, and executing incentive programs and events in the U.A.E. I have worked with a vast number of clients throughout my career.

My peoples’ skills combined with my proficiency in 4 languages and my multi-cultural background has always been my edge at building and maintaining meaningful and professional relationships. I am persistent in my drive for improvement and got an impressive track record of bringing in new business.

I am always striving to bring 110% to the work that I do, and my goal as an Operations Coordinator is to research, plan and execute the best possible solution for the clients that will not only engage, inform, surprise, delight, and impact them, but that will also deliver on measurable business goals. I am the conduit between Agency and the client.

When I am not on the job, I love riding my motorbike throughout the lovely streets of Dubai and admire this beautiful city. I also enjoy going out with friends and discover new restaurants and cool places.

I am currently looking for a suitable position with a company/agency renowned for hiring exceptional people & for giving them unparalleled opportunities to build their careers & capabilities.

If you believe that I can be of help to you or if you would like to learn more about myself, please get in touch at tarekjallad1@gmail.com

I love meeting new people and learning new things, so please feel free to say hello.
